name: Dune Collection
overview: The Dune Collection chronicles a mythic journey across the desert planet Arrakis, where power, prophecy, and survival intertwine. With striking visuals and layered storytelling, it explores themes of destiny, politics, and ecological balance in a richly imagined sci-fi universe.

parts.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.
parts.title: Dune

parts.overview: Follow the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a path of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, Paul endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.
parts.title: Dune: Part Two

parts.overview: The third and final installment in Villeneuve's Dune trilogy. Based on Frank Herbert's novel Dune Messiah.
parts.title: Dune: Part Three
